value.title: Whatever Happened to Those Self-Service Passport Kiosks at Airports?

value.title: Facial Recognition Technology Victimizes People of Color. It Must Be Regulated.
value.excerpt: More than a dozen states have enacted laws regulating how law enforcement uses it. But federal legislation is needed: A piecemeal approach doesn't keep all citizens safe from misidentification.

value.title: Protestor suffering from vision loss awarded $1M in lawsuit against OR police
value.excerpt: A racial justice demonstrator will be awarded $1 million in a lawsuit against Salem, Oregon. The protestor suffered from permanent vision loss and chest injury by the city police.

value.title: Tesla announces it’s moving away from ultrasonic sensors in favor of ‘Tesla Vision’
value.excerpt: Tesla announced today that it is moving away from using ultrasonic sensors in its suite of Autopilot sensors in favor of its camera-only “Tesla Vision” system. Last year, Tesla announced it would transition to its “Tesla Vision” Autopilot without radar and start producing vehicles without a front-facing radar.
